definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be or grow lean (Ar. rad-iya grow thin and weak);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[רָזׇה]] Zep 2:11 obj. false gods, appar. make lean (Vulgate attenuavit; LXX is e)coleqru/sei), but sense strange, < [[רִזׇּה]] (v. Ar. supr.), yet even this very doubtful.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: be made lean, Impf. 3 ms. [[מִשְׁמַן בְּשָׂרוֹ יֵרָזֶה]] Is 17:4.
